title: Exploring the Educational Value of Nursing Clinical Practice Through Work-Integrated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and basic comprehension of clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Most learners are office/administrative professionals participating in projects via limited-technology (smartphone-based) environments, exploring the educational value of nursing clinical practice through scenario-based activities mirroring real-world cases.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the educational value of patient interaction activities in clinical nursing practice and write a report
Learners can recognize the importance of practical assessments and observational activities in Work-Integrated Learning (WIL) environments and reflect these in project deliverables
Learners can systematically document and share nursing practice experiences using smartphone-based tools in limited-technology environments

resources: Smartphone app (note-taking, photo capture, basic video editing)
Group collaboration template for PBL (Project-Based Learning)
Online forum or KakaoTalk group chat (discussion space)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
